extension.name: Hot Scroller for VirtueMart
extension.author: HotJoomlaTemplates.com
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description: This module shows VirtueMart products in a scrollable box.

field.name: loadjQuery
field.label: Load jQuery
field.description: Add JQuery Reference if you don't have it already

field.name: loadjQueryUI
field.label: Load jQuery UI
field.description: Add JQuery UI Reference if you don't have it already

field.name: loadScript
field.label: Load Script Run-time
field.description: Disable this except on first one if you have multiple scrollers on page

field.name: NumberOfProducts
field.description: The Number of Products that are member of the Scrollshow

field.name: categoryId
field.label: Product Category Id
field.description: Products in a specific category (0 - all categories)

field.name: featuredProducts
field.label: Featured Products Only
field.description: Display only products that are featured (marked special)

field.name: ScrollSortMethod
field.label: In which Order the products shall be displayed?
field.description: Defines the display order of the products.

field.name: direction
field.label: Direction
field.description: Direction Style

field.name: transition
field.label: Transition effect
field.description: transition effect

field.name: bgcolor
field.label: Background Color
field.description: Background Color

field.name: panelcolor
field.label: Panel Color
field.description: Panel Color

field.name: bordercolor
field.label: Border Color
field.description: Border Color

field.name: borderthick
field.label: Border Thickness(px)
field.description: Border Thickness

field.name: panelmargin
field.label: Panel Margin(px)
field.description: Panel Margin

field.name: show_product_name
field.label: Show Product Title
field.description: Defines wether the Title of the shown Product is displayed or not.

field.name: titlecolor
field.label: Title Color
field.description: Title Color

field.name: titlecolorhover
field.label: Title Hover Color
field.description: Title Hover Color

field.name: titlealign
field.label: Title Align
field.description: Align the title output of your content items.

field.name: imageSize
field.label: Image Size
field.description: Scale images to this image size

field.name: imageAlign
field.label: Image Align
field.description: Align the image of your content items.

field.name: show_Detail
field.label: Show Product Short Description
field.description: shows the product short description if available inside the animated captions area

field.name: detailcolor
field.label: Detail Color
field.description: Detail Color

field.name: detailalign
field.label: Detail Align
field.description: Align the detail output of your content items.

field.name: show_price
field.label: Show Prices
field.description: Show or Hide the prices for the displayed Products

field.name: pricecolor
field.label: Price Color
field.description: Price Color

field.name: pricealign
field.label: Price Align
field.description: Align the price of your content items.

field.name: show_addtocart
field.label: Show Add-To-Cart Link
field.description: Defines wether an Add-To-Cart Link is shown under the Product Image or not.

field.name: cartcolor
field.label: Cart Color
field.description: Cart Color

field.name: cart_text
field.label: Add to cart text
field.description: Set 'Add to cart' button text

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
